headline: What’s On Tuesday
abstract: The silly superheroes of “Legends” are back for a fifth season, and the British crime series “Vera” returns on BritBox.
lead_paragraph: DC’S LEGENDS OF TOMORROW 9 p.m. on the CW. After defeating a group of monsters and magical creatures that had been released from hell last season — using odd methods, like singing James Taylor songs — the Legends have become a worldwide phenomenon. In this Season 5 premiere, they invite a documentary crew to film them as they look into a new blip in the timeline, but Sara (Caity Lotz) is not happy with the attention.
